# Certifyr - LLM Documentation

## Overview
Certifyr is a platform that simplifies official documentation for institutions and teams. It enables users to create professional, legally reliable documents including certificates, letters, and official paperwork in minutes using easy-to-use templates and seamless exports.

## Website Information
- **URL**: https://certifyr.framer.website/
- **Platform**: Framer
- **Purpose**: Document creation and management platform

## Available Pages

### Main Pages
- `/` - Homepage (landing page)
- `/landing/index.html` - Main landing page with product overview
- `/landing/use-cases.html` - Use cases and feature demonstrations
- `/landing/waitlist.html` - Waitlist signup page
- `/landing/privacy-policy.html` - Privacy policy

### Assets
- `/uploads/` - Logo and brand assets

## Features
- Certificate generation
- Letter creation
- Official document templates
- Professional document exports
- Easy-to-use template system

## Target Users
- Educational institutions
- Businesses and teams
- HR departments
- Any organization needing professional documentation

## Contact
For inquiries, visit the main website.

## Last Updated
February 2026
